revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - Accept. See Sosin's comments. Finalizer, beware, this should be saved as P. Ammon 2, 40, leaving a link under P. Ammon 1 14; note also that under P. Ammon 1 16, fragments a, b and d belong here, so that only fragment c should be left... Line 00, add space after τῆς. Line 6 (pace Sosin) -> ἐ̣πιδεικνύμε[νος] (I'ld prefer to follow the editors; and i think the picture shows it's only an accident with the pen); same for Σισιννί[ο]υ in line 33. End of line 17, I think we can delete the alt ("eher ἀ̣π̣[", edd.). In Sosin's comments, "lin25--> ἀλλ’*apostrophe*" -> "lin35--> ἀλλ’*apostrophe*". Line 44 -> <#ἥ[μισυ]=1/2#>[, ][.10][ τὸν.; line 45 -> <#ἥμισυ=1/2#>. After line 48 "vac.1lin" -> "49. lost.?lin"

Vote - AcceptText - Accept. Top--> 1. lost.?lin 00. [.?].1ς πόλεως τῆς[.?] 1. lost.?lin 1. [.?]ς̣ <:α̣υ̣[.?].1|alt:|α̣ὐ̣[το]ῦ̣(?):>[.3].2[.2]ο̣ς δε̣.2[.2].3[.?] ; lin3--> [.?][ ἐν]; lin3--> ἑκάστοτε; lin6--> ἐ̣πι{ι}δεικνύμε[νος]; lin7--> [.13][, αὐτὸς; lin16-17--> <:[ca.8]17. .1[.4].2[.1].1[.22]τ̣ου|alt:|[φήμης δὲ]17. π̣[ρὸ ὀλ]ί̣γ̣[ου διαδοθείσης τῆς τελευτῆς αὐ]τ̣οῦ(?):> ; lin17 end either del alt or --> α̣ὐ̣[τοῦ ][ca.7]; lin20--> Ἀλε]ξ̣α̣νδ̣ρ̣[εί]αι; lin23--> "εἰ; lin24--> αὐτῶι."]; lin26--> γενομέν[ης] [ἐπὶ(?)][ Φλαουίου]; lin32--> Παν[οπολίταις ][.?]; lin25--> ἀλλ’*apostrophe*; lin38--> Ἄμμωνος φίλους ἀξιώσαντος; lin39--> καμάτους οὐκ ὀλίγους προβαλλομένου, ἕως; lin40-41--> κα[ὶ] <:[συναγάγηι]|alt:|[εἰς ταῦτα]:> <:[.?]41.- .9[.?]|alt:|[τὰ ἀνδράποδα ταῦτα τῆιδε ἐκεῖσε ἐσκορπισμένα καὶ δρασ]41.- μ̣ὸ̣ν̣ ἤ̣δ̣η̣ μ̣ε̣λ̣[ετήσαντα ][.?](?):> ; after 41 add 41. lost.?lin; before 42 add 42. lost.?lin; lin44--> ἥ[μισυ, ][.10][ τὸν; del lin45bis; lin46--> <:.3ο̣σ̣υνης|alt:|γ̣μ̣ο̣σ̣ύνης:> πλέ̣[ο]νος; lin46 add \ἀπὸ τῶν/ after deleted ὅτι; lin43,46 use proper dbl sq brackets

entered text of P.Ammon II 40 from digital copy, proofread against print edition. I put hyphens at lines 41 and 46 but they are only supplied by the editors. I have problems in visualizing double square brackets at lines 41, 42 and 46, but the Editor doesn't read any error so it may be a problem of my pc.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
